column4: Latest;PHNOM PENH: Her Royal Highness ------Norodom Bopha Devi------
column6: has passed away from natural causes
column7: according to a report from the Royal Du Cambodge on Monday
column9: 2019 at 12:30 in a Bangkok hospital.------Princess Norodom Bopha Devi was born on January 8
column11: and was the eldest daughter of His Majesty King Norodom Sihanouk
column12: becoming the principal dancer of the Royal Ballet at 18. She continued to be an ambassador for Cambodian ballet and a patron of the arts.------Between 30 November 1998 â€“ 15 July 2004
column13: she was Minister of Culture and Fine Arts.------She leaves behind 5 children.------UPDATE: HRH has ------arrived back in Phnom Penh------ for a traditional funeral ceremony.
